dmca.title: Photos on Atlanta Website
dmca.body:
Just a friendly reminder to remove the photos we spoke
about this afternoon from your websites.

Additionally, I would ASK, not demand, that you remove
ALL photos of [private] from ALL
websites and groups (to wit: Atlanta Black Booty,
Atlanta Booty Cuties ABC's, Atlanta Booty Shack,
atlantablackbutt, et al.).

I have read one of your model releases obtained from
an independent model with whom you've previously dealt
and according to that release you do not have a valid
claim. Your release is seriously lacking in the three
aspects required to make a binding contract and those
are (1) an offer, (2) and accord and (3) a term.

Therefore, were I to contact your webhost or law
enforcement (ie: Federal Bureau of Investigation) on
behalf of my client, you would be found liable for
which monetary and other punitive damages could be
assessed.

It is not my desire, but certainly within my right, to
take it to that level. I have a person standing by to
file a cease and desist injunction against you and
burtonl.com in Houston, I have made contact with the
FBI to put them on alert regarding copyright
infringement and I am gathering information regarding
your webhost, so that when the injunction is filed I
can immediately have your websites shut down. The next
move is yours.

I would ask that you use reason in making your
decision. The photos aren't doing you any good because
you cannot sell or otherwise offer her services from
Houston, Texas (which would come under Texas' "white
slavery" law) and they aren't doing my client any good
because the information you have accompanying them
(e-mail, phone number, 'etc) is obsolete. It is in the
best interests of all parties to delete the photos and
references to my client.

You have until 12 noon on May 24th, 2005 to effect the
removal off all references of [private] from your websites and domains. There will be
no further communication on this matter.

Sincerely, 

[private]

cc: LK, RC(FBI), CW
